House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution expressing the appreciation of the House of Representatives for the heroism and civic achievements of Sergeant Alvin C. York and encouraging local communities and organizations throughout the United States to begin preparing ceremonies and activities to commemorate the 100th anniversary of his birth in 1987.

summary.text: Expresses appreciation for the heroism and civic achievements of Sergeant Alvin C. York. Encourages local communities and organizations to begin preparing ceremonies and activities to commemorate the 100th anniversary of his birth in 1987.
